item.title: Indigo Authors - Indiweb Features
item.description: The following classes are used to mark up the author bio for Indieweb parsing: h-card, u-photo, p-name, u-url, rel=me, p-locality, p-country-name, u-email, p-note. I’ll be exploring these classes more thoroughly, soon.
